fields.request: Validate screen Admin support chat styling
fields.request_details:
1. Sign into the Django admin with PAGES_CHAT_ENABLED and open /admin/. Confirm the Support chat toggle appears in the lower corner.
2. Open the chat drawer and verify the close control renders the Ã— icon with hover/focus feedback instead of the default missing button styling.
3. Check the message textarea shows the green-themed border/background and legible placeholder text in dark mode.
4. Confirm the chat script pages/js/chat.js loads without 404 errors and messages can still be typed.
